name: Re-Trace (itch)
description:
This is a submission to min-jam 54 where the theme was memories and the limitation was "the game must start and end in different genres". I chose rage-platformer to puzzle-platformer. (Sub genres were allowed!) All assets were made in the 72 hours (except from the font: credits in game.)

In this platformer you play as a soldier sent back down to Earth after a nucleaur attack had ruined it. While there you must track your route, and complete a mission for your corporation!

CONTROLS -

WASD- Movement

Space- Jump

E- Continue Speech

Design choices: I wanted to be able to make the two genres transition smoothly and it still feel like the same game! Therefore throughout the first half of the game the player influences how they play the second half!

Hope you enjoy!
